definitions.definition: A tool or machine used to remove material so as to create a hole , typically by plunging a rotating cutting bit into a stationary workpiece .
examples: Wear safety glasses when operating an electric drill .

definitions.definition: The portion of a drilling tool that drives the bit .
examples: Use a drill with a wire brush to remove any rust or buildup.

definitions.definition: An activity done as an exercise or practice (especially a military exercise), particularly in preparation for some possible future event or occurrence.
examples: Regular fire drills can ensure that everyone knows how to exit safely in an emergency.

definitions.definition: A short and highly repeatable sports training exercise designed to hone a particular skill that may be useful in competition.
examples: At today's practice, the football team performed a variety of goalkeeping drills .

definitions.definition: Any of several molluscs , of the genus Urosalpinx and others, especially the oyster drill ( Urosalpinx cinerea ), that make holes in the shells of their prey.
( uncountable , music ) A style of trap music with gritty , violent lyrics , originating on the South Side of Chicago. [from 2010s]
( countable , music ) A single performance of drill music.

main_definition: A tool or machine used to remove material so as to create a hole , typically by plunging a rotating cutting bit into a stationary workpiece .
secondary_definitions: The portion of a drilling tool that drives the bit .
An activity done as an exercise or practice (especially a military exercise), particularly in preparation for some possible future event or occurrence.
A short and highly repeatable sports training exercise designed to hone a particular skill that may be useful in competition.
Any of several molluscs , of the genus Urosalpinx and others, especially the oyster drill ( Urosalpinx cinerea ), that make holes in the shells of their prey.
( uncountable , music ) A style of trap music with gritty , violent lyrics , originating on the South Side of Chicago. [from 2010s]
( countable , music ) A single performance of drill music.

definitions.definition: An agricultural implement for making holes for sowing seed , and sometimes so formed as to contain seeds and drop them into the hole made.
A light furrow or channel made to put seed into, when sowing.
A row of seed sown in a furrow .

main_definition: An agricultural implement for making holes for sowing seed , and sometimes so formed as to contain seeds and drop them into the hole made.
secondary_definitions: A light furrow or channel made to put seed into, when sowing.
A row of seed sown in a furrow .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) A small trickling stream ; a rill .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A small trickling stream ; a rill .

definitions.definition: An Old World monkey of West Africa, Mandrillus leucophaeus , similar in appearance to the mandrill , but lacking the colorful face.

main_definition: An Old World monkey of West Africa, Mandrillus leucophaeus , similar in appearance to the mandrill , but lacking the colorful face.

definitions.definition: A strong, durable cotton fabric with a strong bias (diagonal) in the weave .

main_definition: A strong, durable cotton fabric with a strong bias (diagonal) in the weave .
